title: Corrosion inhibition performance of benzimidazole derivatives for protection of carbon steel in hydrochloric acid solution
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30295-30316
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05070C, Paper

N. Timoudan, Arej S. Al-Gorair, L. El Foujji, I. Warad, Z. Safi, B. Dikici, F. Benhiba, A. El Kacem Qaiss, R. Bouhfid, F. Bentiss, Salih S. Al-Juaid, Metwally Abdallah, A. Zarrouk
This paper presents a comprehensive study on the corrosion inhibition properties of new benzimidazol derivatives LF1 and LF2 have been examined for inhibiting of Carbon-Steel in 1.0 M HCl.
